title: Column icons don't display when connecting to a Derby database
description: When attempting to connect to a Derby database, the column icons that should appear next to each column in the database are not being displayed.
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons that indicate the data type or properties of each column are not visible.
EB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons should be displayed next to each column, indicating the data type or properties of the column.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the database connection dialog.
2. Choose a Derby database as the connection type.
3. Provide the necessary connection details.
4. Connect to the database.
5. Open the table or view that contains the columns.
6. Observe that the column icons are not visible.
